resourceTemplates.name: Bookings by Status
resourceTemplates.description: Retrieve bookings filtered by one or more statuses (e.g., running, cancelled, completed).

resourceTemplates.name: Bookings by User
resourceTemplates.description: Retrieve all bookings made by a specific user using their UUID.

resourceTemplates.name: Bookings by Date Range
resourceTemplates.description: Retrieve bookings that occurred within a specific date range.
